Man charged in connection with death of woman found in burning car
The mum-of-four from Livingston was described by her children as "strong and compassionate."
07 Nov 2019, 17:17 by Jane Hamilton, https://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/authors/jane-hamilton/
A man has been arrested and charged in connection with the death of a woman found dying inside a burning car.
Tragic Ann Drummond , 47, was discovered with serious injuries in a field near Bathgate in June this year.
She died in Glasgow Royal Infirmary two days later.


The burning car was spotted next to Drumcross Farm, West Lothian, in June (Image: Daily Record)

 
The mum-of-four from Livingston was described by her children as "strong and compassionate."
A 47-year-old man is expected to appear at Livingston Sheriff Court on Friday in connection with her death.
